body_html:
I adapted CIFAR multi gpu for my project. In my case both my code and CIFAR cause memory leaks on 0.8.0rc version. I rolled back to 0.7.1 and I can confirm that there is no memory leak.
I can provide my code if it is till needed.
body_text:
I adapted CIFAR multi gpu for my project. In my case both my code and CIFAR cause memory leaks on 0.8.0rc version. I rolled back to 0.7.1 and I can confirm that there is no memory leak.
I can provide my code if it is till needed.
body:
I adapted CIFAR multi gpu for my project. In my case **both my code and CIFAR** cause memory leaks on 0.8.0rc version. I rolled back to 0.7.1 and I can confirm that there is no memory leak.
I can provide my code if it is till needed.
